oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rose Of My Dreams radio drama - 1947-05-29 - CBS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of the radio drama Rose Of My Dreams, featuring Charita Bauer (performer), Mary Rolfe (performer), Joseph Curtin (performer), and Larry Elliot (announcer) on May 29, 1947 on radio station CBS.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Larry Elliot; Charita Bauer; Mary Rolfe; Joseph Curtin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:15) Opening theme and statements by announcer Larry Elliott / (0:49) Blu White Flakes advertisement / (2:00) Rose Of My Dreams radio drama program / (11:42) Blu White Flakes advertisement / (12:32) Closing theme and statements / (13:30) Sweetheart Extra Lather Soap advertisement / 14:35) Rose Of My Dreams and CBS mention
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bauer, Charita, 1922-1985; Rolfe, Mary A.; Elliott, Larry; CBS Inc.;
